title: Lower Energy Costs Act
summary: This bill addresses energy production and related matters. The bill requires the Department of the Interior to conduct lease sales for oil and gas on the outer Continental Shelf and onshore federal lands. It also addresses permitting requirements for energy projects and infrastructure.
fullText:
[Real bill from 118th Congress]

Lower Energy Costs Act

Introduced: 2023-01-09

Sponsor: Steve Scalise (R-LA)

Cosponsors: 156

Policy Area: Energy

Latest Action: Passed House (2023-03-30)

title: A bill to require the Director of the Government Publishing Office to provide members of the public with Internet access to Congressional Research Service reports.
summary: This bill requires the Government Publishing Office to make Congressional Research Service reports available to the public on a website. The reports must be searchable, sortable, and downloadable.
fullText:
[Real bill from 118th Congress]

A bill to require the Director of the Government Publishing Office to provide members of the public with Internet access to Congressional Research Service reports.

Introduced: 2023-01-23

Sponsor: John Cornyn (R-TX)

Cosponsors: 8

Policy Area: Government Operations and Politics

Latest Action: Read twice and referred to Committee on Rules and Administration

title: Secure the Border Act of 2023
summary: This bill addresses border security, immigration enforcement, and asylum procedures. It requires the Department of Homeland Security to resume construction of the border wall and hire additional Border Patrol agents. The bill also modifies asylum procedures and increases penalties for illegal entry.
fullText:
[Real bill from 118th Congress]

Secure the Border Act of 2023

Introduced: 2023-01-09

Sponsor: Mario Diaz-Balart (R-FL)

Cosponsors: 134

Policy Area: Immigration

Latest Action: Passed House (2023-05-11)
